About MGHF

We revolutionize your loan process

MGHF is a housing finance company incorporated in 2022and received its Certificate of Registrationfrom Reserve Bank Of India(RBI) to operate as a housing finance company (NBFC-HFC) in March 2023. The Company is formed with the objective of providing housing finance to under-served section of the society customers belonging to a low-income group and an economically weaker section.

The Company will operate in affordable housing space where the demand is largely unmet and the shortfall of housing is increasing with increase in population, nuclearization of families and urban migration.
